Description:
Job DescriptionWe are looking to hire a female manicurist/pedicurist for a Ladies' Spa in Erbil Iraq. To qualify for the position you should have 2 years experience in same field. Company will take responsibility to relocate the selected candidate.  Travel ticket, visa and accommodation provided by the company. 

•       Manicure 

•       Hand treatments

•       Pedicure

•       Feet treatments

•       Polish application

•       Gel polish application

•       nail artsRequirements •       Minimum 2 years experience working as a nail technician

•       Be positive and spread happiness

•       Be creative and innovative

•       Able to speak English

•       Good communication and people skills, including good listening skills

•       Time management skills

•       Ability to handle pressure and stress

•       Good Work Habits and discipline

•       Attention to Detail

•       Expert in Mani/Pedi

•       Expert in all shapes nail filing and nail polish applications

•       Expert in gel polish application and removal

•       Knowledge of nail care and nail problems

•       An understanding of hygiene, and health and safety regulations

•       Creative skills for doing nail artBenefitsTravel ticket, visa and accommodation provided by the company
Salary AED 2600 - AED 3000Job Details
